casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jerome PETERS. No. 477P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, Valerie M. Asbell, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of September 2007 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
